IT Consultant with bachelor and master studies at public universities. Engaged in several projects regarding sharing economy (couchsurfing, foodsharing, free and open source software).

Projects:

2020 - Ubuntu Support Groups - Telegram / Facebook administrator

Support groups for new users. 

2020 - Café Flisol
